com.palomamobile.android.sdk.messageThread

Interface IMessageThreadService


  • public interface IMessageThreadService
    This interface is consumed by the Retrofit library to provide access to the message threading functionality of the Paloma Mobile Platform Sharing and Messaging Service RESTful API. All calls are synchronous. To get a concrete implementation of this interface call IServiceManager.getService() This class provides somewhat low level access to the Server API it may be more convenient to use methods in IMessageThreadManager.
    See Also:
    Paloma Mobile Platform Sharing and Messaging Service RESTful API

      • deleteMessageThreadMember

        Void deleteMessageThreadMember(String requestId,
                             long threadId,
                             long userId)
        Removes the specified user from the thread. All their existing received and sent thread messages remain, they just no longer can send or receive any new thread messages.
        Parameters:
        requestId -
        threadId -
        userId -
        Returns:
        nothing
